description: A civilian space shuttle which is sent to inspect the remnants of Junius Seven, prior to the memorial service marking the one-year anniversary of the Bloody Valentine tragedy. The Silverwind is intercepted en route by Earth Alliance forces, who board the shuttle and trigger an argument that escalates until the shuttle is destroyed. At the last minute, a key member of the memorial delegation is evacuated in one of the Silverwind`s lifepods...
name: Silverwind
